mapper.select: SELECT [start_time] , [end_time] , sum(output) as output FROM z_lenspacker_one_hour_capacity where start_time >= '2021-08-18 08:00:00' and output is not null group by start_time, end_time

select machine_no as machineName, sum(output) as capacity from z_lenspacker_one_hour_capacity where end_time > CONVERT(varchar(100), #{startTime}, 21) and end_time < CONVERT(varchar(100), #{endTime}, 21) group by machine_no
